doc:
Tom Forman (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Forman_(actor) 0 For other people of the same name see Thomas Forman
Tom Forman (February 22, 1893 – November 7, 1926) was an American motion picture actor, director, writer, and producer of the early 1920s. For other_people of the_same_name see Thomas_Forman_Tom_Forman ( February_22_,_1893 – November_7_,_1926 ) was an_American_motion_picture_actor , director , writer , and producer of the_early_1920s .
